title: A great Tom Cruise movie
review: A great film of its time. Entertaining, and exciting.

movie_title: Pirates of the Caribbean: Dead Man's Chest
title: Fantastic
review: Pretty entertaining movie, but the first one is better. Great acting.

movie_title: Pirates of the Caribbean: At World's End
title: Great movie
review: Pretty entertaining, I liked it a lot. Great movie.

movie_title: Star Wars: Episode IX - The Rise of Skywalker
title: Worst movie I have ever seen
review: Everything about this movie is trash. They kill kylo ren for no reason at all, and we are stuck with Rey now. Rey is the worst character throughout each of the movies, but she is made the main character while Finn is a side character. Finn had more potential but was wasted. They also used objects to propel the story forward, causing everything to happen by luck instead of them having to work for it. Terrible movie. A disgrace to the Star wars Franchise.

title: Good movie
review: It's a great movie, but way too long. Dicaprio's acting was incredible, but it could've been shorter.

title: The story is entertaining, pretty good movie
review: Story is entertaining, and the monologue is pretty good.

title: A strangely good movie
review: Strangely good, but disturbing. Sometimes even comedic.

title: An Under-Rated Film
review: Drive is a well scored movie, with a very well written monologue. Very entertaining.

movie_title: Star Wars: Episode VIII - The Last Jedi
title: Absolute garbage
review: The acting is terrible, story is horrendous, monologue is garbage. The entire movie could've been better if it wasn't made.

title: Pretty okay film
review: The acting was good as well as the monologue, but I wouldn't watch it again. A little slow moving, but tells a good story.
